name: The Witch's Apprentice: A Magical Mishap
description: The young witch Grimelda and her hard-working brooms need you! Will you join them on a magical Click-Management adventure and defeat the nasty ooze?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Min. CPU 1500 MHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Grafic card with 128 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Min. CPU 1500 MHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Grafic card with 128 MB, 3D-Acceleration recommended DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: yes
